title_sort: walt whitman to robert buchanan, 4 september 1876
title: Walt Whitman to Robert Buchanan, 4 September 1876
text: Sept. 4 '76I forward you by Express to-day, same address as this letter the package of Books (see list on other side)â€”I wish Tennyson to have a set & have enclosed one, & would ask you to do me the favor of seeing that it is safely transmitted to him. Notwithstanding the disclaimer in yours of April 28 I also send a set for Richard Bentley in response to his kindness & generosity: (if any thing I know not of prevents its reaching him, I wish you to keep it for yourself.) Please see that the photograph is given to the School of Art, with my affectionate respects. Trusting to your kindness to see that they are carefully sent to the subscribers. Walt Whitman to Robert Buchanan, 4 September 1876
